nodes.text: A forested planet was located in the Outer Rim Territories. The Human male Irol hailed from this planet. He learned how to fly a speeder bike on his homeworld. During the Galactic Civil War, a conflict between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, Irol became an Imperial scout trooper sergeant by 4 ABY.
The planet was first mentioned in Sergeant Irol's 1999 card for the Endor Limited set of the Star Wars Customizable Card Game.
